response.overview: The notion of what consciousness is has eluded even the most erudite of neuroscience scholars and diligent researchers for some time. But what about notions of Universal Consciousness? If finite consciousness within human beings has proven so elusive, then grasping notions of a universal consciousness must be even more mysterious. Explore nuanced theories of human consciousness. Set forth down the path of spiritual awakening and enlightenment by exploring the nature of consciousness, its building blocks, and how we are all connected through a collective consciousness.
response.tagline: Start upon your own journey of awakening and enlightenment by exploring what consciousness is, where it comes from and how we are all connected through a universal consciousness.
response.title: Connecting with Universal Consciousness
